title: Enhancing Hospitality Competencies: Structured Problem-Solving Strategy Workshop for Prospective Science Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific concepts and experience in solving simple problems
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can solve physics problem types with 80% accuracy by applying a five-step problem-solving strategy (problem definition → variable analysis → strategy development → implementation → verification).
Learners can independently structure complex problem-solving processes with over 70% autonomy using scaffolding tools (checklists/templates).
Learners can improve final solution accuracy by 20% by revising problem-solving strategies three or more times based on formative assessment feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
